product_overview: Lilyum Flora is an e-commerce platform specializing in premium floral products and related services, offering an engaging and seamless shopping experience with a modern, responsive UI and comprehensive user and admin features.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive and visually appealing product browsing experience focused on floral products.
Enable users to seamlessly register, authenticate, manage profiles, and complete purchases.
Offer robust order management, including history and tracking, to both users and administrators.
Equip admins with comprehensive management tools for products, orders, customers, categories, and marketing assets.
Deliver a responsive, interactive UI enhanced with flower-themed animations and effects for engaging user experience.
Integrate secure and scalable backend services using modern technologies and third-party platforms like Supabase and Vercel.
key_features: User Features: Product catalog browsing, detailed product pages, shopping cart, checkout process, user authentication (login/register), user profile management, order history and tracking, wishlist, address management, and contact form.
Admin Features: Admin login, dashboard overview, management of products, orders, customers, categories, banners, SEO settings, scraper tools, and general settings.
UI Features: Flower animation effects, magic dust button effects, side cart drawer, bottom navigation, floating action buttons, and fully responsive design.
API Integration: RESTful endpoints supporting authentication, admin functions, products, orders, customers, categories, banners, scrapers, SEO, and settings management.
Third-Party Services: Utilization of Supabase for authentication and database management, and Vercel for deployment.
user_flow_summary: Users visit the home page displaying banner and featured products with flower animations.
Users browse the product catalog via the /catalog page.
Users navigate to individual product detail pages from the catalog.
Authenticated users can add products to a side drawer shopping cart and proceed to checkout.
Users register or login through dedicated pages and manage their profiles.
Users can view their order history and track ongoing orders via their profile.
Users manage their wishlist and saved addresses for quicker checkout.
Users contact customer service through the contact form page.
Admin users login to a dedicated admin panel to manage products, orders, customers, and marketing components via various dashboard pages.
validation_criteria: All user interface components are responsive and visually consistent across supported devices and screen sizes.
User authentication and authorization flows function securely and support full registration and login workflows.
Shopping cart and checkout processes complete successfully with accurate order creation and state updates.
Admin dashboard features allow CRUD operations on products, orders, customers, categories, banners, and settings.
API endpoints respond correctly to requests with proper validation, error handling, and data persistence.
Third-party authentication and database integrations with Supabase perform reliably under load.
UI animation and interactive effects render smoothly without degrading user experience.
Deployment and development server setups follow configured ports and commands for consistent developer experience.
